classSpec.desc: groups elements bearing the enjamb attribute.
Regroupe des éléments portant l'attribut enjamb.
comprende gli elementi definiti dall'attributo enjamb
>comprende los elementos definidos por el atributo enjamb

attDef.desc: indicates that the end of a verse line is marked by enjambement.
Indique que la fin de la ligne en vers est marquée [ / se distingue ] par un enjambement.
indica che la fine di un verso è caratterizzata da un enjambement
indica que el final de un verso está caracterizada por un encabalgamiento.
句跨りが起こる行末を示す．

valItem.desc: il verso finisce a fine riga
el verso acaba al final de la línea.
the line in question runs on into the next
la ligne en question continue [ /empiète ] sur la suivante
il verso continua alla riga seguente
el verso continua en la línea siguiente.

remarks.p: The usual practice will be to give the value yes to this attribute when enjambement is being marked, or the values weak and strong if degrees of enjambement are of interest; if no value is given, however, the attribute does not default to a value of no; this allows the attribute to be omitted entirely when enjambement is not of particular interest.
